content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Food was delicious! The portions were generous and the owner was super friendly. I highly recommend their shrimp platter which comes with garlic purple rice, crunchy shrimp, and salad. For me, it's 5/5 stars!
